title: extractors_used
description: A list of extractors used to extract metadata for a dataset or file

extraction_parameter.description: Parameters used together with the extractor
extraction_parameter.title: Extraction parameter

extraction_time.description: The time (since epoch) when this extractor was used to extract the applicable metadata
extraction_time.title: Extraction time

agent_name.description: git identity name of person/process that extracted the metadata
agent_name.title: Agent name

agent_email.description: git identity email of person/process that extracted the metadata
agent_email.title: Agent email
